SEARCH
Module jakarta.persistence
Package jakarta.persistence

Interface FindOption

All Known Implementing Classes:
CacheRetrieveMode, CacheStoreMode, LockModeType, PessimisticLockScope, Timeout
public interface FindOption
An option influencing the behavior of EntityManager.find(java.lang.Class<T>, java.lang.Object). Built-in options control locking, cache interaction, and timeouts.

This interface may be implemented by custom provider-specific options which extend the options defined by the specification.

Since:
3.2
See Also:

  • PessimisticLockScope
  • CacheRetrieveMode
  • CacheStoreMode
  • Timeout
